description: Returns the available automatic snapshots for an instance or disk. For more information, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the source instance or disk from which to get automatic snapshot information.

nested_items.name: resourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the source instance or disk for the automatic snapshots.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the automatic snapshot. The possible values are Instance, and Disk.

nested_items.name: autoSnapshots
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the automatic snapshots that are available for the specified source instance or disk.

nested_items.name: date
nested_items.description: The date of the automatic snapshot in YYYY-MM-DD format.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the automatic snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the automatic snapshot.

nested_items.name: fromAttachedDisks
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the block storage disks attached to the instance when the automatic snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: sizeInGb
nested_items.description: The size of the disk in GB.
